verses.name: Matthew 28:13
verses.text: Saying, Say ye, His disciples came by night, and stole him away while we slept.

verses.name: Matthew 28:14
verses.text: And if this come to the governor’s ears, we will persuade him, and secure you.

verses.name: Matthew 28:15
verses.text: So they took the money, and did as they were taught: and this saying is commonly reported among the Jews until this day.

verses.name: Matthew 28:16
verses.text: Then the eleven disciples went away into Galilee, into a mountain where Jesus had appointed them.

verses.name: Matthew 28:17
verses.text: And when they saw him, they worshipped him: but some doubted.

verses.name: Matthew 28:18
verses.text: And Jesus came and spake unto them, saying, All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth.
